title: Ice Knife
content:
ane Trickster Ice Knife can be cast by using the following Items: Frost Prince

Druid, Sorcerer, Wizard, Arcane Trickster

Ice Knife Tips & Notes

Upcast: Cast as a 2nd Level or higher, the damage increases by 1d6 Cold for each spell slot level above 1st. A target with the Wet status is Vulnerable to Cold/Lightning damage and will sustain double damage from this spell. Ice Surface: Difficult Terrain - Halved Movement.
